layout.name: Contempo
layout.description:
Clean.  Modern.  Professional.
Contempo's streamlined design features your latest book on the front page, ready for your readers to find. With it's subtle graphics and color schemes, your content come first.  Also included are a blog, a calendar, and a biography.
layout.setup:
person_id = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("people", "default_biography") person = Roxiware::Person.find(person_id)
subtitle = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "subtitle") title = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "title") title = person.full_name if title.blank?
Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "webmaster_email", "9041D4FC-D97F-44F0-BFF2-FC2B4D3F6270", person.email) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "site_copyright", "4454EFC0-EC3C-4C9D-8EF5-6F848E3B33D7", person.full_name) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "meta_description", "F0E1D8A9-33B9-4605-B10F-831D2BB3D423", person.full_name) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "meta_keywords", "1843B11F-EBA1-4B9A-A01F-F98A3E458FA8", title+", #{subtitle}") Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("blog", "blog_editor_email", "89139210-E699-4D47-A656-B2F860D2015B", person.email) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("blog", "blog_title", "3D102055-8C9B-4838-90F7-2B3C7DB23A1D", title)
books_menu_permission = @current_layout.get_by_path("_/header_bar/main_menu/menu_root/child_2/permission") books_menu_permission.value = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("books", "enable_books") ? ((Roxiware::Book.all.count > 0) ? "guest" : "admin") : "super" books_menu_permission.save!
calendar_menu_permission = @current_layout.get_by_path("_/header_bar/main_menu/menu_root/child_3/permission") calendar_menu_permission.value = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("events", "enable_events") ? "guest" : "super" calendar_menu_permission.save!

params.param: <%= person_id = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("people", "default_biography") person = Roxiware::Person.find(person_id) title = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "title") title = person.full_name if title.blank? content_tag(:div, title, :class=>"site_title") + content_tag(:div, Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "subtitle"), :class=>"site_subtitle") %>
Sign up for my mailing list!

param.name: response
param.param: Thank you for your interest, and Welcome!

param.name: notification
param.param: A Contact Request Has Been Received from: $email

params.param: Sign up for my mailing list.
Join my e-mail list.
